Reviews.Title: “exceptional value, great central location and friendly staff”

Reviews.Content: price hotel exceptional clean daily housekeeping quiet comfortable ensuite bathroom tv tea extra seating free wifi breakfast extensive buffett style perfect setting day included price staff friendly helpful printing online pass didnt internet cafe location fantastic close local attractions haggia sofia blue mosque etc quieter noise highly recommend hotel visit turkey season hotel

Reviews.Title: “Sultan's Eye”

Reviews.Title: “True to it's name!”

Reviews.Title: “The right price for your basic needs”
Reviews.Author: dwhitebsc
Reviews.Content: budget price hotel expect sleep shower size somewhat irrelevant own loo hot water comes shower eventually compared nearest cheaper options excellent value money otherwise price dorm hostel tele turkish tele looks free wifi mobile phone allowing checkin return flight line research visit friendly helpfull staff didnt arrange happily throw decent breakfast location perfect price simply cant complain unusal read couple bad reviews hotel elsewhere positive previous bad reviews ignored compare price basic hotel understand bet expensive worse fewer facilities

Reviews.Title: “The perfect location, lovely hotel”

Reviews.Content: 3 nights sultans eye hotel istanbul hotel perfect location blue ayasofya mosques topkapi palace pretty town easy walk river visit hotel extremely clean friendly staff lovely buffet style breakfast home cakes 11 quiet friendly stay
